signup-page.description: You are just a click away from getting started

upper-view.description: Patient Health Care Journey Made Easy Than Ever Before!

middle-view.title: Introducing
middle-view.doctor-description: Patients can now consult with Doctors online from anywhere
middle-view.nurse-description: Patients are taken care by Care Coaches near by them
middle-view.report-description: Doctors can track their patients’ health from anywhere

medical-checkup-description.title: Online Doctor Consultation
medical-checkup-description.content: Patients can make an appointment for a Doctor’s consultation from their home convenience, at the scheduled time Patient can join the live interactive video call with Doctor online, to consult and Doctor can also give prescriptions during the session.

medical-report-description.title: Personal Care Assistance
medical-report-description.content: Personal Care Coaches are assigned from near the patient’s living place. The Care Coach will make an appointment to administer medicines or to check patients health, vitals & always at reach to assist patients in need.

calendar-sync-page.title: Welcome to Remote Patient Monitoring
calendar-sync-page.subtitle: First, let’s sync your email calendar for a personalised experience
calendar-sync-page.description: You can change this information anytime, in “Settings” section from “My Profile”
calendar-sync-page.privacy-msg: Your information is safe. We do not use or sell your information
